title:

I'm came back from the hospital .
I'm under pain killers.
Lord thank you for this day a ...

attachments.displayName:
Sleep well.
I'm came back from the hospital .
I'm under pain killers.
Lord thank you for this day a day of love an Grace .
Father i pray that there if its you plan becomes a wonder for my left leg.the operation lets lose the mew skin tissue .
I'm ask not must father I'm already a blessed man but father will you take the incredible pain away.
I pray father for you all my friends my love i pray to you from my heart.
I lay it in your hands lord with my leg.
Its you plan time wonders an blessings an i lay down my praying for you in a praying of a small man how is trusting on you lord.
More i can not pray why I'm not God.
You are the Almighty an i lay my recovery now full in your hands father.
If its you will so let it be done if not father,than I'm still see you as my Almighty God.
I lay my praying in the hands of Jezus so that my redeemer brings it forward by you my Almighty God.
I'm trying to sleep they put new bandage on my leg because they made it open again .
My hope an faith is on you lord.
When i see my life as this point than I'm this a blessed man.
Its genetic my fathers side had all leg problems .
My faith an hope is on you my father.
I learned if you see the small things in live that gives value to your relationship to Jezus God gives ore shows you bigger things ore wonders.
My hope is on that word father.
Till later my friends .
Love understanding an respect i pray for you all from my heart.
Love you dear God.
Sleep well for later that the angels protect our dreams..xxxxxxx

object.content:
Sleep well.
I'm came back from the hospital .
I'm under pain killers.
Lord thank you for this day a day of love an Grace .
Father i pray that there if its you plan becomes a wonder for my left leg.the operation lets lose the mew skin tissue .
I'm ask not must father I'm already a blessed man but father will you take the incredible pain away.
I pray father for you all my friends my love i pray to you from my heart.
I lay it in your hands lord with my leg.
Its you plan time wonders an blessings an i lay down my praying for you in a praying of a small man how is trusting on you lord.
More i can not pray why I'm not God.
You are the Almighty an i lay my recovery now full in your hands father.
If its you will so let it be done if not father,than I'm still see you as my Almighty God.
I lay my praying in the hands of Jezus so that my redeemer brings it forward by you my Almighty God.
I'm trying to sleep they put new bandage on my leg because they made it open again .
My hope an faith is on you lord.
When i see my life as this point than I'm this a blessed man.
Its genetic my fathers side had all leg problems .
My faith an hope is on you my father.
I learned if you see the small things in live that gives value to your relationship to Jezus God gives ore shows you bigger things ore wonders.
My hope is on that word father.
Till later my friends .
Love understanding an respect i pray for you all from my heart.
Love you dear God.
Sleep well for later that the angels protect our dreams..xxxxxxx
God Bless You Brother +geert-jan Schoonbeek, I'm praying for you, In Jesus Name, Amen.
Am praying for God's healing touch and sustaining strength.
